title: Collaborative Competency Enhancement Program Through Online Music Ensemble

context.prior_knowledge: Basic musical instrument performance skills and digital tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Short-term immersive education for professionals participating during non-working hours. Utilizes real-time synchronization technology and mobile-based collaboration tools.

learning_goals: Learners can perform real-time musical collaboration with ensemble members using synchronized performance techniques in mobile environments
Learners achieve at least 80% accuracy in musical expression through digital gesture-based communication
Learners submit ensemble videos produced through project-based assessment and provide peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
